summary:
"Fearless" is Taylor Swift's second album, released in 2008. She wrote most of the songs while touring and produced it with Nathan Chapman. The album is about love and heartbreak, inspired by her teenage experiences. It has a country-pop sound with lots of string instruments.

"Fearless" was very popular, topping charts in many countries and winning many awards, including Album of the Year at the Grammys. It sold over 12 million copies worldwide. Swift re-recorded the album in 2021 due to a dispute over the ownership of her music.
title: Fearless (Taylor Swift album)
